rules: Rule1: Person1 has the authorization to submit the manuscript or person2 has the authorization to submit the manuscript.
Rule2: Provided that reviewer1 is invited to review publication1, editor1 is assigned to publication1.
Rule3: Whenever reviewer2 is invited to review publication1, editor1 is assigned to publication1.
Rule4: If reviewer1 accepts to review publication1, then reviewer1 has been invited to review publication1.
Rule5: Reviewer1 accepts to review publication1 or reviewer2 accepts to review publication1.
Rule6: Under the condition that reviewer2 accepts to review publication1, reviewer2 has been invited to review publication1.
Rule7: If person1 agrees to the copyright transfer, then payment of the publication fee is processed for person2.
Rule8: Person1 agrees to the copyright transfer or person2 agrees to the copyright transfer.
Rule9: Under the condition that person2 agrees to the copyright transfer, publication1 is successful.
Rule10: Whenever payment of the publication fee is processed for person1, publication1 is successful.
Rule11: The payment of the publication fee is disputed by person1 or, if payment is processed for person2, then it is processed for person1.
Rule12: Payment of the publication fee is disputed by person2 or it is not the case that payment is disputed by person1.
Rule13: Provided that person2 has the authorization to submit the manuscript, publication1 is successful.
Rule14: If legal action is threatened by person1, then legal action is threatened by person2.
Rule15: A settlement is offered by person1 to person2 or a settlement is offered by person2 to person1.
Rule16: Whenever a settlement is offered by person2 to person1, legal action is not threatened by person2.
Rule17: If the settlement from person1 to person2 is accepted, then, provided that a settlement is offered by person1 to person2, legal action is not threatened by person2.
Rule18: Provided that the settlement from person2 to person1 is accepted, then, if a settlement is offered by person1 to person2, legal action is not threatened by person2.
Rule19: Under the condition that the conflict regarding publication1 is resolved, publication1 is delayed.
Rule20: The conflict regarding publication1 is resolved or the conflict regarding publication1 has escalated.
Rule21: Provided that the conflict regarding publication1 has escalated, the settlement from person1 to person2 is accepted or the settlement from person2 to person1 is accepted.
Rule22: If publication1 proceeds, then the settlement from person1 to person2 is accepted or the settlement from person2 to person1 is accepted.
Rule23: Whenever publication1 is delayed, publication1 proceeds.
Rule24: Funding for publication1 is secured or funding for publication1 is lost.
Rule25: If funding for publication1 is lost, then, whenever the manuscript is approved, it is not rejected.
Rule26: Whenever the ethics committee approves publication1, publication1 has obtained ethical approval.
Rule27: The ethics committee approves publication1 or the ethics committee rejects publication1.
Rule28: Provided that the ethics committee rejects publication1, then, if funding is secured, whenever the manuscript is approved, it is not rejected.
Rule29: The manuscript for publication1 is withdrawn or, if the manuscript is revised, then it is published.
Rule30: Under the condition that the final version of the manuscript for publication1 is submitted, the manuscript for publication1 is published.
Rule31: Whenever plagiarism is detected in publication1, plagiarism in publication1 is confirmed.
Rule32: If the investigation into publication1 is concluded, then sanctions are imposed on publication1.
Rule33: Whenever person1 is cleared regarding publication1, then, if sanctions are imposed, an investigation has been opened.
Rule34: Person1 is cleared regarding publication1 or person2 is cleared regarding publication1.
Rule35: If the reputation of person1 is restored, then, under the condition that person2 is cleared, if sanctions are imposed, an investigation has been opened.
Rule36: The reputation of person1 is restored or the reputation of person2 is restored.
Rule37: Whenever the reputation of person2 is restored, then, provided that person2 is cleared, if sanctions are imposed, an investigation has been opened.
Rule38: Under the condition that an invoice for the publication fee is sent to person1, payment of the publication fee is processed for person1.
Rule39: The invoice for the publication fee is disputed by person1 or, if person1 agrees to the copyright transfer, an invoice is sent to person1.
Rule40: Provided that person1 receives funding from grant1, the manuscript for publication1 is accepted.
Rule41: Person1 receives funding from grant1 or person2 receives funding from grant1.
Rule42: If payment of the publication fee is received from person1, then payment of the publication fee is processed for person1.
Rule43: Whenever a receipt for the publication fee is issued to person1, payment of the publication fee has been received from person1.
Rule44: If the financial records for publication1 are updated, then accounting for publication1 is complete.
Rule45: The financial records for publication1 are updated or the financial records for publication1 are pending.
Rule46: Provided that the financial records for publication1 are pending, then, whenever person1 agrees to the copyright transfer, a receipt is issued to person1.
Rule47: Provided that publication1 is ready for audit, then, if person1 agrees to the copyright transfer, a receipt is issued to person1.
Rule48: There is a financial discrepancy in publication1 or, if accounting is complete, then publication1 is ready for audit.
Rule49: Under the condition that publication1 has passed the financial audit, there is no financial discrepancy in publication1.
Rule50: Negotiation between person1 and person2 is successful or negotiation between person2 and person1 is successful.
Rule51: Provided that negotiation between person2 and person1 is successful, the settlement from person2 to person1 is accepted.
Rule52: Whenever person2 receives funding from grant1, the manuscript for publication1 is not rejected.
Rule53: Under the condition that an agreement has been signed by person1 and person2, then, if negotiation is successful, the settlement is accepted.
Rule54: Legal mediation has been initiated for publication1 or, if an agreement is not signed by person1 and person2, then an agreement is signed by person2 and person1.
Rule55: If the manuscript for publication1 has been submitted, then publication1 is successful.
Rule56: Provided that editor1 is assigned to publication1, then, if the manuscript is not submitted, the manuscript is published.
Rule57: If it is not the case that if person1 has authorization then publication1 is successful, then the manuscript is rejected.
Rule58: If it is not the case that if plagiarism is detected then plagiarism is not confirmed, then the investigation is concluded.
Rule59: Provided that it is not the case that if plagiarism is detected then plagiarism is not confirmed, it is not the case that an investigation is opened.
Rule60: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the manuscript is not submitted then the final version is submitted, plagiarism is detected.
Rule61: Provided that an agreement is not signed by person1 and person2, then it is not the case that an agreement is signed by person2 and person1.
Rule62: Whenever the manuscript for publication1 is not submitted, the manuscript for publication1 is revised.
Rule63: Provided that publication1 is not successful, legal action is threatened by person1.
facts: Fact1: The manuscript for publication1 is approved.
Fact2: Publication1 has passed the financial audit.
Fact3: It is not the case that the payment of the publication fee is disputed by person2.
Fact4: Publication1 does not have ethical approval.
Fact5: The manuscript for publication1 is not withdrawn.
Fact6: The manuscript for publication1 is not accepted.
Fact7: The invoice for the publication fee is not disputed by person1.
Fact8: Legal mediation is not initiated for publication1.
Fact9: The manuscript for publication1 is not published.
